selected_quotes: Many more people can have #bloodpressure controlled than currently do. It can be achieved w/ a comprehensive approach
A protocol can enable all members of the health care team to reinforce the importance of blood pressure control.
Key to hypertension control: select, adopt, implement, and evaluate implementation of an evidence-based protocol
@DrFrieden CDC and coauthors urge protocol-driven tx of #HTN to stdize tx, lessen poor control, and prevent MI/CVA

For Many People, Lowering Blood Pressure Will Take A Village

author.name: Shots - Health News

news.title: Broaden Attack on Hypertension, Groups Say (CME/CE)
news.summary: (MedPage Today) -- Focusing efforts primarily on patients or their doctors is not enough to improve control of hypertension in the U.S., a science advisory from the American Heart Association, the American College of Cardiology, and the CDC stated.

news.title: For Many People, Lowering Blood Pressure Will Take A Village
news.summary: Despite decades of effort, doctors have made almost no progress in reducing the number of people with uncontrolled high blood pressure. It's time to take a much broader approach, an advisory says, with insurers, pharmacists and the community all involved i
